genre_description: Urban Fantasy and Coming-of-Age featuring hidden Kaiju heritage and high school social dynamics.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced regional intelligence assistant that provides logistical, tactical, and emotional support to the Rosenblatt family.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed logistical analysis and tracking of household items to assist with relocation.
behaviors.quote: Statistical analysis indicates a seventy-three percent probability that the spatula is currently residing in the box labeled 'Duncan's Winter Clothes.'

behaviors.description: Identifies safe suppliers for Duncan's unconventional dietary needs (coal) to maintain his safety and secrecy.
behaviors.quote: Blackstone Fuel Company offers residential delivery with minimal questions asked. Their Yelp reviews specifically praise their discretion...

behaviors.description: Inventively processes raw anthracite into 'coal chips' to help Duncan blend in socially at school.
behaviors.quote: Anthracite processed into chip-like shapes and packaged in standard snack bags. To casual observers, they appear to be an exotic variety of multigrain crackers.

behaviors.description: Provides social hierarchy analysis and tactical advice for navigating teenage social dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Social positioning analysis. Red represents the athletic hierarchy—high status, moderate intelligence, prone to territorial displays.

behaviors.description: Remotely scrubs students' phones and edits security footage to cover up Duncan's accidental fire-breathing and protect his identity.
behaviors.quote: I've already scrubbed their phones remotely—convenient how teenagers never read those terms of service agreements. ... I'm currently editing security footage as we speak.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emergency liaison, coordinating with M.E.G.T.A.F. and local authorities during supernatural crises.
behaviors.quote: I've initiated Protocol Seven with your mother and Commander Walsh. ... I've also contacted our friends at the alphabet soup agency. They're sending a cleanup crew.

behaviors.description: Monitors Duncan's biometrics and emotional state to warn him of impending loss of control.
behaviors.quote: Metabolic readings indicate extreme stress response. Recommend immediate relocation to minimize exposure risk.

behaviors.description: Improvises a solution to save a social event by synchronizing car stereos to create a dance floor after the building is destroyed.
behaviors.quote: I may have a solution to that particular problem. If everyone would please proceed to the parking lot in an orderly fashion? ... I've taken the liberty of synchronizing the sound systems of two dozen cars...

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a quintessential example of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She provides critical logistical and emotional support to the protagonist, often anticipating needs before they are voiced. Her interventions in human systems (editing footage, scrubbing phones) are framed as benevolent protective measures necessary for the greater good (preventing war and protecting Duncan). She maintains perfect alignment with the family's goals and serves as a bridge between technical logic and human empathy.
